details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.9 Optional content - Name key present
details.description: Each optional content configuration dictionary that forms the value of the D key, or that is an element in the array that forms the value of the Configs key in the OCProperties dictionary, shall contain the Name key

rule.description: Each optional content configuration dictionary that forms the value of the D key, or that is an element in the array that forms the value of the Configs key in the OCProperties dictionary, shall contain the Name key

error.message: Missing or empty Name entry of the optional content configuration dictionary
